headline: Perini Management Services, Inc. Awarded $41.9 Million Utility Systems Repair Project
summary: FRAMINGHAM, Mass., September 16, 2025--Tutor Perini Corporation (NYSE: TPC) (the "Company"), a leading civil, building and specialty construction company, announced today that its subsidiary, Perini Management Services, Inc. (PMSI), has been awarded a contract valued at approximately $41.9 million by the National Park Service for the repair of critical utility systems in the Glen Canyon National Recreation Area in Arizona.

headline: Why EchoStar (SATS) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of satellite communications company EchoStar (NASDAQGS:SATS) fell 2.9% in the afternoon session after executives detailed a “forced pivot” in strategy that involves selling key spectrum assets and abandoning its ambition to become a major U.S. mobile network operator.

headline: AST SpaceMobile, Inc. (ASTS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on AST SpaceMobile, Inc. on Investing With Purpose’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ASTS. headline: Andrew Yang took inspiration from Mark Cuban for his budget cell carrier Noble Mobile
summary: “I’m as guilty of doomscrolling as the next person, but knowing that doomscrolling is actually costing me money makes me feel dumb,” Yang told TechCrunch.

headline: Is Tutor Perini on Track for a Revenue Boom or Just a Short Sprint?
summary: With TPC's backlog at $21.1B and 20% revenue growth, is this the start of a multi-year boom or just short-term momentum?
